modules.description: Provides functions to configure and query text styling attributes, including background and foreground colors, boldness, and preformatted text settings. Operates on a `t` type representing style configurations and a `color` type for color values. Used to apply consistent formatting in terminal output or text rendering pipelines.

Converts ktree structures into boxed values using recursive mapping and provides formatting capabilities for text output. Operates on ktree and t types, with specialized functions for tree transformation and string generation. Used to generate structured text outputs and interoperate with box-based data representations.

Provides functions to render nested data structures—such as boxes, lists, arrays, and tables—in formatted text and HTML. Operates on custom tree-like structures and collections with hierarchical elements. Used to generate readable output for debugging or exporting structured data to web-friendly formats.

Manages structured text output with customizable styling and nested box representations. Supports operations on style configurations and color values to format text, and transforms ktree structures into boxed, styled outputs. Enables alignment, coloring, and recursive formatting of complex data types. Can generate neatly aligned tables, colored text blocks, and hierarchical box layouts from nested data.
